page.title: 13 AMENITIES.
page.content: {BEAR STREET CEMETERY. Bear street cemetery is next to the allotments.It had two chapels which used to be used for two religions of the same kind. The Graves are usually dug to about 5 to 6 feet.The N.D.D.C owns the Cemetery.It has been opened since 1860.A graveyard is attatched to a Church but a cemetery is not. {YOUTH GROUPS}The Youth group at the top of Gloster R.d is held from 7:30pm until 9:00pm.It has skittles table tennis,badminton,and a record player.They also go on outings. At the Gorwell valley youth group we play football, pool, snooker and we somtimes have disco's.It starts at 7:00pm and ends at 9:30pm
